metadata.title: USN-4956-1 -- Eventlet vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Eventlet incorrectly handled certain requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4956-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-eventlet-doc - 0.25.1-2ubuntu1.1 python3-eventlet - 0.25.1-2ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
